MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the PA5 postcode area of Johnstone. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3:49pm. Our emergency response team have arrived in the local area and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7:00pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:32pm on Saturday, 20th March 2021
